file_content.text: The... fight on Corellia must have been so harrowing. I hope you're alright.
So it comes down to Corellia. Either we win, or... no, we must win!
We can't lose a friend to the enemy, Jedi, not again!
A shame I can't come on the mission... but it's all right, I'll be cheering for you!
Do you think those Voss would tell my fortune?
Strange. I keep wanting to ask Grell's advice about all this.
So what was Republic security doing when Grell was captured? What do we pay our taxes for?
Jedi, I'm still not sure recruiting these "Esh-kha" is a good idea.
Don't worry, Jedi, we'll conjure up an army in no time!
You don't think Blaesus told the Emperor anything about me, do you?
Jedi, what's going on? Did something happen to Blaesus?
Good luck, Jedi. Show those pirates who's in charge!
You saved dozens of Selkath lives on Attis Station. I'll never forget this, Jedi, never.
Hmph! There was no Republic rescue when my world was bombed! I suppose ocean planets are expendable.
Hijacked ships, a Jedi Master whose feet are barely wet... This is going to be a disaster!
Manaan... I wonder what's changed since I left.
